instant-payment.title: Instalment payments
instant-payment.description: We offer instalment payments to regular partners. Payment is due after the client has already flown away.

we_offer.title: Elevate your partnership with us
we_offer.subtitle: We offer:
we_offer.description: Unlock exclusive benefits and strong partnerships tailored for long-term cooperation at the highest level.

card1.title: White label partnership
card1.description: Work under your brand as an air carrier.

card2.title: Pricing confidentiality
card2.description: Your pricing policy is kept confidential.

card3.title: Affiliate program
card3.description: Earn increasing discounts with fulfilled orders.

card4.title: Payment flexibility
card4.description: Accepting any forms of payment and commission payments.

personal-flight-manager.title: Personal flight manager
personal-flight-manager.description: For each of our partners we only provide managers with over 10 years experience in organising private flights.
personal-flight-manager.subtitle: We are committed to safeguarding your reputation.

contact-us.title: Contact us
contact-us.description: We will show you why partnering with us is the ideal choice for you.
